alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cheyenne, eastern Kimball, southwestern Morrill and southeastern Banner Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 826 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Redington to 11 miles south of Dix. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potter, Dix, Court House And Jail Rocks, Brownson and Redington. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 27 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
